column2: "The once-a-year Christmas party for the children who lost their parents to Darker attacks!"
"...I tried to plan it, but after all if we're going to do it, then I want it to be extraordinary and gorgeous!"
"So I've got to ask you! I need your help making decorations that we can use!"
"Right now, we don't have enough hole punchers. I think if we had a Gulfur fang, then it'd be cooler and cuter!"
"I'll be getting ready for the party here. Good luck!"
